General.Name: Taiwan Taxi Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Taxi Co.,Ltd. provides taxi services in Taiwan. The company offers call a taxi service. It also provides moving house, fast fixing and delivery, designated driver, airport pick-up, special education students' pick-up, and pet's special pick-up services. In addition, the company is involved in the taxi dispatch, express delivery, and advertising services. It serves approximately 350,000 customers through a network of approximately 10,000 taxis. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.162, Chang?an East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 104
